General.Name: POSCO M-TECH Co. Ltd
General.Description: Posco M-Tech Co., Ltd. operates as a steel material-specialized company. Its products include aluminum deoxidizers; ferro silicon for use in removing impurities in steelmaking process; ferro molybdenum, which is used to enhance special steel; magnesium ingots and Fe powder; and StrapMaster, a steel packing robot. The company was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Pohang, South Korea.
